mapper.select: select m.M_Level mLevel, m.M_ID mId from MEMBER m, FOLDER f, F_TAG ft where m.M_ID = f.M_ID and f.F_NO = ft.F_NO and (ft.FT_NAME1 like concat('%',#{fName},'%') or ft.FT_NAME2 like concat('%',#{fName},'%') or ft.FT_NAME3 like concat('%',#{fName},'%')) order by m.M_POINT, f.F_POINT desc
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE deleted = '0'

select cd.SITE_URL siteUrl, cd.C_NAME cName, mt.MYC_NAME, cd.CARD_NO, count(*) as cmt, SUM(cd.C_POINT) as total, cd.SITE_URL, max(mt.REG_DATE) as regDate from MYC_TAG mt, MY_CARD myc, CARD_DB cd where mt.MYC_NO = myc.MYC_NO AND myc.CARD_NO = cd.CARD_NO AND mt.MYC_NAME like concat('%', #{cName}, '%') group by mt.MYC_NAME, cd.CARD_NO, cd.SITE_URL having sum(cmt) * (0.1) < cmt order by cmt DESC, regDate DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM MY_CARD WHERE deleted = '0'
